quotes.text: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Good luck is another name for tenacity of purpose.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.text: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler

quotes.text: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all, there is only the meaning we each give to our life.
quotes.author: Ana√Øs Nin

quotes.text: Meaning is not what you start with but what you end up with.
quotes.author: Peter Elbow

quotes.text: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: How is it possible to find meaning in a finite world, given my waist and shirt size?
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: The least of things with a meaning is worth more in life than the greatest of things without it.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: One needs something to believe in, something for which one can have whole-hearted enthusiasm. One needs to feel that one's life has meaning, that one is needed in this world.
quotes.author: Hannah Szenes
